subject: Add AI note: ask clarifying questions before assuming bug cause
body:
Documented the markdown rendering mistake where 3 wrong fixes were
committed before asking the user what they were actually doing. Added
rule to CLAUDE.md AI Notes and logged in AI_MISTAKES.md.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01NFd5wfEQCn6KwD5ZnipfYq
title: Add AI note: ask clarifying questions before assuming bug cause
